section.title: Luthetus.Ide.RazorLib.Terminals.Models.TerminalCommandRequest Class Reference

para.para: 'workingDirectory' is intended to be an absolute path in string form.

listitem.para: TerminalCommandRequest (string commandText, string? workingDirectory, Key< TerminalCommandRequest > key)
Input: the parsed terminal command that is about to begin execution.
Input: the parsed terminal command that is being executed.
Input: the parsed terminal command that just finished.

section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: 'workingDirectory' is intended to be an absolute path in string form.
If 'workingDirectory' is null, then the WorkingDirectory of the terminal will not be changed.

Input: the parsed terminal command that is being executed.
This Func will block the terminal from executing further terminal commands in the queue until it has returned.
